events.text: Despite the Bug King's powerful magic, Val fought on with determination. He struck with his sword, each blow chipping away at the Bug King's defenses.
Val used classes and create different versions of his sword, each with unique attributes, testing to see which one would deal the most damage.
After a long and grueling battle, Val managed to find a weakness in the Bug King's defenses. The bug king was weak to dark attribute.

With one final, powerful strike using the swords he imbued with dark attribute Val's sword pierced the Bug King's exoskeleton. 
The Bug King let out a deafening roar that echoed through the Great Hall before finally collapsing.

Val stood over the defeated Bug King, exhausted but victorious. He was shocked when he saw Gandalf standing nearby, holding a tome in his hand.
 He already knew, it was the IDE Tome they seek.
Val, good job killing the Bug King," Gandalf said with a smile. "Now I can bring you back to your original timeline.
Congratulation! you defeated the bug king! wasn't it? did you get back to your original timeline? What happen to Analexius?  complete  this final questions to find out.
